page.title: 05Brighton By-Pass
page.content: Funded by the Department of Transport this is proposed to skirt the edge of existing development.Commencing at Shoreham it will follow a cutting through Benfield and Foredown Hills to a junction at Hangleton,where a link road down West Hove golf course will connect it to the Old Shoreham Road.The trunk road will continue to the Lewes Road. The by-pass will remove unnecessary traffic from the town centre,relieve pressure on side routes and serve as a barrier to further encroachment on the Downs. It would make an impact on the landscape as it passes through areas of outstanding natural beauty.Cuttings and embankments, streetlights and signs would be needed.The plan also involves a net loss of 230 houses and a noise insulation measure of 810.
